trans-unit.source: Determines whether changes that are made to a <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> are tracked.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否追蹤對 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> 所進行的變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode> enumeration specifies whether or not changes that are made to items in the collection are tracked automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode>列舉值會指定是否自動追蹤集合中的項目所做的變更。

trans-unit.source: Values from the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode> enumeration are used when you create a new instance of the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> class.
trans-unit.target: 從數值<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode>當您建立的新執行個體時，會使用列舉<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>類別。

trans-unit.source: Changes to items in the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> are automatically tracked by the client.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端會自動追蹤對 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> 中的項目所做的變更。

trans-unit.source: Changes made to items in the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> are not tracked automatically by the client.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端不會自動追蹤對 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> 中的項目所做的變更。
